mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCERECORD ( ATTNO, EMPNO, WORK_DATE, WORKIN_TIME, WORKOUT_TIME, WORK_TIME, WORK_STATUS, USE_YN ) SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE , 'YYMMDD') || LPAD(ATTNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), -- SEQUENCE 사용 E.EMPNO, TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE), '', '', '', '', 'Y' FROM EMPLOYEES E LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCERECORD A ON E.EMPNO = A.EMPNO AND A.WORK_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) WHERE A.EMPNO IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT t1.EMPNO, t2.NAME, START_DATE , END_DATE FROM APPROVAL t1 JOIN EMPLOYEES t2 ON t1.EMPNO = t2.EMPNO WHERE t1.EMPNO = #{empno} AND APPROVAL_STATUS = 'ST04' AND FORM_ID LIKE 'BC%'

SELECT t1.EMPNO, t2.NAME, START_DATE , END_DATE FROM APPROVAL t1 JOIN EMPLOYEES t2 ON t1.EMPNO = t2.EMPNO WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE AND APPROVAL_STATUS = 'ST04' AND FORM_ID LIKE 'BC%'
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCERECORD SET WORK_STATUS = ( SELECT CODE FROM TBL_COMM WHERE CODE = 'AT05' ) WHERE WORK_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AND EMPNO IN ( SELECT t1.EMPNO FROM APPROVAL t1 JOIN EMPLOYEES t2 ON t1.EMPNO = t2.EMPNO WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE AND APPROVAL_STATUS = 'ST04' AND FORM_ID LIKE 'BC%' )
